original_text: آج آپ کو کیا پریشانی ہوئی ہے? جیسرور, مجھے بہت زیادہ سینے میں درد ہو رہا ہے اس لیے میں نے سوچہ کی اس کا جیکوپ کروہ لینہ چاہی چیگ ہے اور شروع کرنے سے پہلے کیا آپ اپنی جنس اور املیاد دلوہ translated_text: Today, what's troubling you?  Sir, I've been having a lot of chest pain, so I thought I should get it checked out.  Before we begin, could you please state your age and gender? Sir, I'm 49, and this chest pain… when did it start? It started yesterday, but it's getting worse.  And where is the pain located? It's in my chest, on the left side. And if it started yesterday, how long has it been going on? I think it's been about two hours. Has it been continuous or intermittent? I'd say it's been fairly continuous. And how would you describe the pain? People sometimes use words like sharp, burning, stabbing… I think it's pretty sharp.  Since yesterday, have you done anything that lessened the pain? Lying down helps. Does lying down increase the pain? No. Does it radiate anywhere else? No.  Is there anything else that exacerbates the pain? Doesn't seem like it. No.  Are there any other associated symptoms? Maybe not.  When the pain started, can you recall anything you were doing? Mmm, I mean, I was moving some furniture, but I've done that before. So you don't think you strained yourself while doing that? No. On a scale of one to ten, with ten being the worst pain you've ever experienced, how would you rate the intensity of this pain? I'd say it's a seven. Pretty bad.  Along with the pain, do you have any other symptoms? I'm feeling a little dizzy, and I have some slight discomfort in my jaw. Have you experienced any loss of consciousness? No. Have you had any previous heart problems? A little. Are you short of breath? Only slightly, due to the jaw issues. Have you had jaw problems since the pain started? Yes. Recently, have there been any times when you've been unusually tired or unable to move around much? No, no. Are you currently suffering from any illness or infection? No signs of infection. Have you had any vomiting? No, no nausea.  What about pain while urinating? No problems urinating or with bowel movements. Have you coughed up any blood? No. Have you been coughing? No.  Have you noticed any crackling sounds along with difficulty breathing? Doesn't seem so.  Absolutely no wheezing sounds or anything similar? No, I think only when I really have trouble breathing. Has this ever happened before? No, no. Have you experienced any night sweats? No.  What about any rashes or skin changes? No rashes, but I feel like my neck is a little swollen. Do you have any neck pain? No. Have you been in any accident, like a car accident, or anything that might have caused a neck injury? No. Any cuts or bruises? No.  Regarding your past medical history, do you have any pre-existing medical conditions? No. Any recent hospital admissions? No. Any previous surgeries? No. Do you regularly take any medication, prescribed or over-the-counter? No. What about cholesterol medication? No, none. Any allergies?  None. All up-to-date? Yes, all up-to-date, excellent. Can you tell me a little about your current living situation? Sir, I live in a one-bedroom apartment, that's all. And how do you support yourself financially? I work in construction. Seems like a physically demanding job. Do you smoke cigarettes? Yes, I do. How many cigarettes do you smoke? About a pack a day. How long have you been smoking? For the past fifteen years. Do you smoke marijuana? Occasionally. How much marijuana do you smoke per week? Maybe about half an ounce a week, not very much. Do you use any other recreational drugs, such as cocaine, amphetamines, or opioids? No. Have you used intravenous drugs before? No. Do you drink alcohol? Yes, I do. How much alcohol do you drink each week? I have about one or two beers daily, so about fourteen beers a week. Briefly, can you tell me about your diet and exercise? I try to eat a healthy dinner most days, but my lunches are mostly unhealthy. And regarding exercise, I try to work out every other day, for about half an hour. Good, that's good. They're working on activity and wellness. Has anything like this ever happened in your family before? No. Has anyone in your family suffered a heart attack?  Actually, yes. My aunt had a heart attack at the age of 45.  Does anyone in your family have high cholesterol? I think my aunt did.  Has anyone in your family had a stroke? No strokes.  Any family history of cancer?  Anything else you wanted to tell me about today's situation? No, I don't think so; I think you've asked me everything.
